oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Possibilities for developing combined recycling and renewable energy production in Juva and Järna
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lehto, Tiina
Granstedt, Artur
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two ways of local recycling of te solid fraction of biowaste, one of which is combined with the production of biogas, have been studied within the BERAS-project. On-farm biogas plant treatment in Juva could also support agriculture.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Lehto, Tiina and Granstedt, Artur (2005) Possibilities for developing combined recycling and renewable energy production in Juva and Järna. In: Granstedt, Artur; Thomsson, Olof and Schneider, Thomas (Eds.) Environmental impacts of eco-local food systems - final report from BERAS work package 2. Ekologiskt lantbruk, no. 46. Sveriges lantbruksuniversitet, Centrum för uthålligt lantbruk, pp. 107-109.
